body: If only I was in Joey's spot. But then again I'd probably be too beta to cop a feel as well.
Ah, it'd be nice to get more of these kinds of doujins for Yu-Gi-Oh.
I was having fun reading the cute little interactions at the start. Unfortunately I was quickly reminded that I was read a doujin and not a shipping fanfic (at least not the child friendly kind)

Can we have a sequel please?I love this couple & it would suck if this is just a one-shot deal.
=/
this shit is hot... In america
